svg:

playerControls: Dragging a finger or mouse over the screen will start showinga 360 virtual joystick, continuing to drag in that direction willmake the character move in the direction the player is dragging away fromthe initial touch point."Evolve the Game" is a top down action game. The player has to survivefor 10 minutes as progresisively stronger waves of enemies start coming from the sides of the screen.joystickenemyenemyenemylife bartimerenemyThe player starts with a rock weapon, that throws rocks at the nearestenemy every second. If an enemy is defeated, it drops a crystal, whichwhen the player picks up increases his XP and fills up the bar. Filling up thebar levels the player up, increasing player levelThe player starts in the center of a 2d map. as the player moves aroundthe camera follows and keeps the player in the center of the screen.XP BarPlayer LevelCurrentWeapon
